laboratory_examinations.findings: Amniotic fluid karyotype was 46,XY, add(18)(p11.2), indicating the presence of additional material on the short arm of chromosome 18 at band 11.2.
Mother's karyotype was 46,XX,t(1;18)(q42.1;p11.2), indicating a balanced translocation. Fetus's karyotype was 46,XY,der(18)t(1;18)(q42.1;p11.2)mat, indicating an unbalanced translocation.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Blood Test for Estradiol and FSH
laboratory_examinations.findings: Serum estradiol level was elevated to 62 pg per milliliter; FSH was normal at 7.6 mIU per milliliter.
Serum level of beta-hCG was 649 mIU per milliliter, indicating early implantation, with a subsequent level of 1818 mIU per milliliter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Indicated an increase in hCG levels after implantation.
